thread.title: The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali celebrates new flavors
thread.title_full: The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali celebrates new flavors

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali celebrates new flavors
text:
The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali celebrates new flavors The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali celebrates new flavors Details Category: Hotel   11:45 The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali hosted its annual Appreciation Gathering for Bali based business partners and media representatives on 7th August 2015. There were more than 130 guests in attendance for this lively event at the resort’s newly opened dining venues Seasonal Tastes and Velada Tapas Bar & Kitchen. The gathering was a fantastic opportunity for the Sales & Marketing team of The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali to connect with business partners and express appreciation for their support shown over the past year. 
Upon arrival, guests were warmly greeted with drinks alongside signature Velada canapés and with the mood-enhancing music signature of the Westin brand at the tranquil ambiance of the resort’s main pool. The start of the evening was marked with a welcome speech from The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali’s Managing Director Mr Bipan Kapur where he also formally introduced the Sales & Marketing team. Following on from the formalities there was a remarkable Fire Dance performance that took a place in the center of the Main Pool at dusk before the MC invited guests to enter Seasonal Tastes as it was revealed. A delicious dinner featuring live stations from all around Asia and were entertained by the soulful performance of Excellent Duo. The excitement continued as guests were ushered into the after-party to enjoy margaritas and sangrias as they entered and enjoyed great tasty tapas at the newly launched Velada Tapas Bar & Kitchen. The memorable evening was highlighted with a special Flamenco dance show and great jazzy tunes performance by David and Friends. There were also lucky draws throughout the entire evening with generous prizes from affiliated Starwood Hotels & Resorts in Asia Pacific region along with the Grand Prize for a roundtrip flight to Dubai courtesy by Emirates airline packaged with a three night stay at FourPoints Dubai. More music closed the evening along with a farewell gift of a freshly potted Rosemary plant complete with a care card for every guest, this unique gift symbolizes the growing relationship between The Westin Resort Nusa Dua, Bali and its Partners.
